thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: These Two Nations Will Top the 2018 Olympics Medals Race, WSJ Projects

author: Rachel Bachman
title: These Two Nations Will Top the 2018 Olympics Medals Race, WSJ Projects
text:
The medals race in the Pyeongchang Olympics could come down to two nations: one that’s mastered a single activity, cross-country skiing; and another that’s gotten startlingly good at a bunch of them.
Norway and the U.S. finished in a virtual dead heat in The Wall Street Journal’s projected medal count. Each could win 36 Olympic medals, although the Journal’s simulations show the U.S. is slightly likelier to get there.
“Our...
